- Lightened the fixed header glass gradient so it reads as a translucent white while keeping the blur and depth cues.
- Updated nav link colors/shadows to stay legible against the brighter background.

```45:94:src/components/Navigation.astro
  .nav-white {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, 
      rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6) 0%, 
      rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.45) 45%,
      rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) 100%
    );
    backdrop-filter: blur(24px);
    ...
  }

  .nav-link {
    color: #0a0a0a;
    ...
  }
```

Next step: give the header a quick look across pages and mobile widths to confirm the lighter treatment still contrasts well with surrounding hero imagery.

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Adding active indication snippet**</details></think>

---

- Added an `isActive` helper that checks `Astro.url.pathname` so each nav link knows when it matches the current route and sets `aria-current="page"` for accessibility.
- Introduced `nav-link--active` styling: subtle brand-tinted pill plus an extended underline to reinforce which page you’re on.

```9:19:src/components/Navigation.astro
const { pathname } = Astro.url;

const isActive = (href: string) => {
  if (href === '/') {
    return pathname === '/';
  }
  return pathname.startsWith(href);
};
```

---
